StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerParentMissionPlanOCC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @ClassNumber int, @Organiza.onType as varchar(3) AS
DECLARE @ParentOrgName varchar(45)
--- RETRIEVE PARENT ORG NAME SELECT @ParentOrgName = RO.NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID)
--- INSERT ORG ID INTO TEMP TABLE CREATE TABLE #ORG (ORG_ID INT) INSERT INTO #ORG (ORG_ID) VALUES (@Organiza.onID)
--- SHIP MISSION DATA SELECT @Organiza.onID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, @ParentOrgName AS NAME, 'Ship' AS MISSION_TYPE, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NFO_MISSION, 0)) AS NFO_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NAVAL_AIR_MISSION, 0)) AS AIR_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS GROUND_MISSION, 0 AS PLCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.FEMALE_MISSION, 0)) AS FEMALE_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW1_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW1_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW2_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW2_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW3_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW3_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.BLACK_MISSION, 0)) AS BLACK_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.HISPANIC_MISSION, 0)) AS HISPANIC_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OTHER_MISSION, 0)) AS OTHER_MISSION, 1 AS MISSION_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN #ORG O ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OFFICER_SHIP_MISSION_PLAN OMP ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OMP.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OMP.OCC_CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassNumber AND OMP.OFFICER_SOURCE_CODE = 'OCC' AND OMP.FISCAL_YEAR = 0)
UNION
--- CONTRACT MISSION DATA SELECT @Organiza.onID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, @ParentOrgName AS NAME, 'Contract' AS MISSION_TYPE, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NFO_MISSION, 0)) AS NFO_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NAVAL_AIR_MISSION, 0)) AS AIR_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS GROUND_MISSION, 0 AS PLCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.FEMALE_MISSION, 0)) AS FEMALE_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW1_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW1_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW2_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW2_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW3_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW3_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.BLACK_MISSION, 0)) AS BLACK_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.HISPANIC_MISSION, 0)) AS HISPANIC_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OTHER_MISSION, 0)) AS OTHER_MISSION, 2 AS MISSION_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN #ORG O ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OFFICER_MISSION_PLAN OMP ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OMP.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OMP.OCC_CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassNumber AND OMP.OFFICER_SOURCE_CODE = 'OCC' AND OMP.FISCAL_YEAR = 0)
UNION
--- SUBMISSION MISSION DATA SELECT @Organiza.onID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, @ParentOrgName AS NAME, 'Submission' AS MISSION_TYPE, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NFO_MISSION, 0)) AS NFO_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.NAVAL_AIR_MISSION, 0)) AS AIR_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS GROUND_MISSION, 0 AS PLCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, 0)) AS OCCR_GROUND_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.FEMALE_MISSION, 0)) AS FEMALE_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW1_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW1_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW2_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW2_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.LAW3_MISSION, 0)) AS LAW3_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.BLACK_MISSION, 0)) AS BLACK_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.HISPANIC_MISSION, 0)) AS HISPANIC_MISSION, SUM(COALESCE(OMP.OTHER_MISSION, 0)) AS OTHER_MISSION, 3 AS MISSION_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN #ORG O ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OFFICER_SUBMISSION_MISSION_PLAN OMP ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OMP.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OMP.OCC_CLASS_NUMBER = @ClassNumber AND OMP.OFFICER_SOURCE_CODE = 'OCC' AND OMP.FISCAL_YEAR = 0) ORDER BY MISSION_CODE
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #ORG
